channel.title: ! need help with objects!
channel.description:
Ok, so Im using Pimpscape, and I want my training zone to be on karamja,
how do i make it so i can have the range target, a bank, hay bales and any other obect to spawn where i put the coords in!?!?!?
I opened up objects.cfg but all that shows are doors and where the doors are, please help!!
Where do i put them??? HELP ME PLZ!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

@3_hit_pure wrote:

Pimpscape doesn’t have the thing that lets you add global objects.

Do fedxers tut, it easy if your not a noob.

item.title: ! need help with objects!
item.dc:creator: @_Nirvana † Nirvana †
item.description:
@_Nirvana wrote:

go to client.java look for

Makes Global objects

You Should see this:

[code] public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
if(p != null){
client person = (client)p;
if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != “null”)){
if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);
}
}
}
}
}
public void NewObjects() { //0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH

           makeGlobalObject(3438, 3566, 409, 0, 10);//alter
           makeGlobalObject(3434, 3538, 1740, 0, 10);//stairs
           makeGlobalObject(3434, 3537, 1740, 0, 10);//stairs
           makeGlobalObject(2597, 3401, 451, 0, 10);//rune 1

}[/code]

Or something like it maybe not the make global objects lines

I recomend you replace what you have with that (remove those make global object lines)

Then use this for making new objects

               makeGlobalObject(XCoord, YCoord, ObjectID, Orientation, 10);//alter

This is for orientation

0= WEST | -1 = NORTH | -2 = EAST | -3 = SOUTH

Read full topic
